title: Individual Giving Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at United Farm Workers (Los Angeles, CA) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: The first meeting was two people from the department through Zoom. They asked the basic questions of why I want to work there and looked over my resume. They also went over the company and how the changes they were having. I was very interested that they were going to begin working remotely 100% of the time but at some point in the interview it felt like they didn't know what they wanted from the position. I received their "Thank you for applying but we fulfilled the position" sent from a badly automated email with the title of the position changed.
Interview Questions:
-Why do you want to work at UFW? 
-Customer service behavioral questions.
